comment:
* Record source container for "Digital Service". *
    *
  • [Record Source Type] - 1 byte *
  • [Digital Identification] - 7 bytes *
* @hide

variables.name: DIGITAL_SERVICE_IDENTIFIED_BY_DIGITAL_ID
variables.comment: Indicates that a service is identified by digital service IDs.

variables.name: DIGITAL_SERVICE_IDENTIFIED_BY_CHANNEL
variables.comment: Indicates that a service is identified by a logical or virtual channel number.

variables.name: mIdentificationMethod
variables.comment:
* Type of identification. It should be one of DIGITAL_SERVICE_IDENTIFIED_BY_DIGITAL_ID and
         * DIGITAL_SERVICE_IDENTIFIED_BY_CHANNEL

variables.name: mBroadcastSystem
variables.comment:
* Indicates the Digital Broadcast System of required service. This is present irrespective
         * of the state of [Service Identification Method].

variables.name: mIdentification
variables.comment: * Extra parameter for digital service identification.
